alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 14 at 6:32PM MST until December 15 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin mainly from near Milner to Craig. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The fog may expand through the overnight hours but as of this evening impacts are mainly near Highway 40 from Craig to Milner and areas to the North.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Upper Yampa River Basin
